channel.title: Pre-2.03 Extension for <tag> Element
channel.description:
Because everyone in the Open Ag Funding Partnership are keen beans, we decided we couldn't wait for the next version of IATI to start using the new <tag> element which has been [outlined for inclusion in 2.03](https://discuss.iatistandard.org/t/non-statistical-secondary-sectors-excluded-2-03/849/22?u=rory_scott).
As such, we've written up an extension with documentation on how to use it with version 2.x of the standard here: > [**Tag Element Extension**](http://openagfunding.readthedocs.io/en/latest/extensions/)
If you have any questions of feedback, please don't hesitate to get in touch.
